suncertify.server

Interface BrokerRMIServerIF

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BrokerServerIF, java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BrokerRMIServer

    public interface BrokerRMIServerIF
extends BrokerServerIF, java.rmi.Remote
    The BrokerRMIServerIF interface defines the interface that the RMI server must implement in order to satisfy the RMI remote object requirement. It extends the BrokerServerIF.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Augustine Ogundimu
    See Also:
    BrokerServerIF, BrokerRMIServer, Remote

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface suncertify.server.BrokerServerIF

        addRecord, bookRecord, deleteRecord, findRecords, getRecord, registerUpdateListener, releaseRecord, unregisterUpdateListener, updateRecord
